# omega-reheat

## What's this ?

This component is in charge to show a button for trigger a graph reheat.

To know what a graph reheat is, check `omega-graph`'s documentation.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Events

| Event                 | Description                               | Type                |
| --------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `omega-reheat.reheat` | Fires when use decides to start a reheat. | `CustomEvent<void>` |
